CustomObject.description: Billing Accounts used in Cognition Pilot phase. Specify Billing Account Number without T or P in Cognition Pilot Account Name (DeveloperName) field and Billing Account Name in Label field. Please put X as the first character for Cognition Pilot Account Name (DeveloperName) field. Value must start with an alphabet for this field. Maximum 5 records only.
CustomObject.label: Cognition Pilot Accounts
